QueryViewSpec.Name: Constituents with a Recurring Gift or Gift in Batch Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with StatementConstituents as (
select distinct CONSTITUENTID, 'Gift in Batch' as INCLUSIONREASON from dbo.BATCHREVENUE join dbo.BATCH on BATCHREVENUE.BATCHID = BATCH.ID join dbo.BATCHTEMPLATE on BATCH.BATCHTEMPLATEID = BATCHTEMPLATE.ID where BATCHTEMPLATE.BATCHTYPECATALOGID in ('326C43A6-D162-4FD4-8D61-FEF9A0EE8C5E', '91102EFD-E0E9-467F-B2CA-8B510D06C937')
union all
select distinct ft.CONSTITUENTID, 'Active or Held Recurring Gift' as INCLUSIONREASON from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rs join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.ID where rs.STATUS in ('Active', 'Held') )
select distinct CONSTITUENTID as ID, INCLUSIONREASON from StatementConstituents
